attributes.action: Bring bank holiday equality to the UK
attributes.background: Like many British people I love a bank holiday, there aren't many things better in life than bank holidays. So when I realised England had a total of 3 bank holidays less then Scotland this year I was shocked. We should bring equality to all countries in the UK and give England more bank holidays!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition outlining which extra days should be bank holidays in England.
